newsitem.title: ITALY: SOCCER-ITALY V MOLDOVA TEAMS FOR WORLD CUP QUALIFIER.
newsitem.headline: SOCCER-ITALY V MOLDOVA TEAMS FOR WORLD CUP QUALIFIER.

text.p: Teams for a World Cup qualifier between Italy and Moldova on Saturday:

Italy - 1-Angelo Peruzzi, 6-Alessandro Costacurta, 5-Alessandro Nesta, 2-Ciro Ferrara, 3-Paolo Maldini, 7-Angelo Di Livio, 10-Demetrio Albertini, 8-Roberto Di Matteo, 4-Dino Baggio, 11-Gianfranco Zola, 9-Christian Vieri.

Moldova - 1-Denis Romanenco; 5-Vitali Culibaba, 3-Vasile Toloconicov, 4-Ion Testimetanu, 2-Oleg Fistican, 6-Marin Spinu, 8-Oleg Sischin, 9-Sergiu Epureanu, 7-Alexandur Curtean, 11-Serghei Clescenco, 10-Vladimir Gaidamasciuk.
